14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Mas'ud Al-Ansari: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited the price of a dog, the earnings of the fornicator (from harlotry), and the news of the fortune-teller." This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي ثَمَنِ الْكَلْبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Price Of A Dog
